pkgmetadata.longdescription: similar - A similar text finder written in Python =================================================.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/ncrocfer/similar.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/ncrocfer/similar:code:`similar` is a Python library used to find the correct spelling from a misspelled text.Usage-----.. code-block:: python >>> from similar import best_match >>> best_match('rasbery', ['apple', 'raspberry', 'pear']) raspberryInstallation------------The tool works with Python 2 and Python 3. It can be installed with `Pip` ::: pip install similarNotes-----You can also use a file object for the wordlist :.. code-block:: python from similar import Similar s = Similar('rasbery', open('wordlist.txt')) print(s.best())Or a generator :.. code-block:: python from similar import Similar def genwords(): for line in ['apple', 'raspberry', 'pear']: yield line s = Similar('rasbery', genwords()) print(s.best())
